Title: Windy Lighthouse Journal
Text:
...... There are a lot of rumors about it, not only from the outside world, but even within the Pioneer Association.
Since igniting an interest in it, I have gone through almost all the information left by previous generations, and have also gone to ask seniors who had taken up the task of investigating it, but nothing has been conclusive, leaving only a few memorized bits and pieces here and there.

"Above the windswept lighthouse is the star that lights the universe."
"Rarely do you see such a rejuvenated antiquity; it is, as those poets say, the lamp of civilization."
"This earth is drenched in Scar, but it has never given up on healing itself, and the light that comes on every night is its very manifestation in Recuperate, one breath, one breath, one breath ...... If one day this light ceases to shine, perhaps... ..."
"The lighthouse, the lighthouse! What exactly does it light up? The hope of light, or a dark, unknown mystery that leads to darkness?"
